document.full_text: the central intelligence agency has no intention of bringing home its chief operative in pakistan despite an apparent attempt by the pakistani media to unmask his identity, u.s. officials said on monday.
document.title: cia won't withdraw spy chief in pakistan: officials
lines_and_colors: the central intelligence agency has no intention of bringing home its chief operative in pakistan despite an apparent attempt by the pakistani media to unmask his identity, u.s. officials said on monday.
